response.original_title: Nuvola Rossa: Bagnaia and Ducati's Perfect Comb1nation
response.overview: The exclusive documentary "Nuvola Rossa: Bagnaia and Ducati's Perfect Comb1nation" narrates through unseen and unfiltered footage the historic achievement accomplished by the "perfect combination" Pecco Bagnaia and Ducati, 2022 MotoGP World Champions after a historic comeback in the Championship in only eight Grands Prix from -91 points. Filmed during the last three rounds of the season, the film shows the key moments that brought Pecco and the Ducati Lenovo Team into history through Pecco's point of view, that of his family and his team.
response.tagline: Ducati and Pecco's intense showdown for MotoGPâ„¢ glory
response.title: Nuvola Rossa: Bagnaia and Ducati's Perfect Comb1nation
